sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: bapi_Doorlocking_processPSOverification ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/inc/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.h line 588 Requirement is satisfied here: bapi_BH_DoorlockingState_bapPostpone ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/src/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.c line 459 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/test/swut/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.c.test line 1346 IF pc_BAP_aktiv == 0x01 AND pa_Aktiver_Teilnehmer_Doorlocking_aktiviert == 0x01 AND STPerso_Status == 0x02 THEN the Doorlocking BAP Handler shall perform full Active Participant functionality for PSO Personalized Parameters listed below in chapter 'PSO Personalized Parameters' (SWR_ICAS1_L3_BAPH_DoorL_468)
Additional information: Active Participant functionality is described in 5.1.2. SWR - L3_CBody_PSO_Active_Participant Doors module. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_BAPH_DoorL_1423 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_BAPH_DoorL_1424
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: bapi_Doorlocking_processPSOverification ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/inc/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.h line 589 Requirement is satisfied here: bapi_BH_DoorlockingState_bapPostpone ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/src/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.c line 460 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/test/swut/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.c.test line 1347 IF pc_BAP_aktiv == 0x00 OR pa_Aktiver_Teilnehmer_Doorlocking_aktiviert == 0x00 THEN the Doorlocking BAP Handler shall not perform any Active Participant functionality
Additional information: pc_BAP_aktiv == 0x00 or pa_Aktiver_Teilnehmer_Doorlocking_aktiviert == 0x00, regardless of value of STPerso_Status is enough for No Active Participant Functionality state. This means that PSO Personalized Parameters related to Doorlocking LSG (listed in SWR_ICAS1_L3_BAPH_DoorL_468) will no longer be treated as PSO Personalized Parameters that can be personalized for each user separately, but like common BAP parameters, which are customized per vehicle. No STPerso_ signals will be evaluated. PSO_ImExport is switched off in the FunctionList, so no requests will be received. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_BAPH_DoorL_1424 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_BAPH_DoorL_1425
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: bapi_Doorlocking_processPSOverification ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/inc/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.h line 590 Requirement is satisfied here: bapi_BH_DoorlockingState_bapPostpone ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/src/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.c line 461 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/BAP/BAPHandler_Doorlocking/c/test/swut/BAPHandler_Doorlocking_Task.c.test line 1348 IF pc_BAP_aktiv == 0x01 AND pa_Aktiver_Teilnehmer_Doorlocking_aktiviert == 0x01 AND STPerso_Status != 0x02 THEN the Doorlocking BAP Handler shall support only common settings for whole vehicle
Additional information: Support of common settings includes: - ignoring Control Commands (Perso_Steuerung, Perso_Steuerungsparameter, Perso_Kontonummer) and - storing set of settings common for whole vehicle instead of for 7 separate user profile memory slots
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_BAPH_DoorL_1425 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
